enWisdom: Intellects are gifts, etiquettes are earned
The best of blessings is the intellect

Wisdom: إِنَّ مَنْ رَزَقَهُ اللَّهُ عَقْلًا قَوِيماً وَعَمَلًا مُسْتَقِيماً فَقَدْ ظَاهَرَ لَدَيْهِ النِّعْمَةَ وَأَعْظَمَ عَلَيْهِ الْمِنَّةَ
enWisdom: Verily the one who has been bestowed with a sound intellect and upright action by Allah has indeed been granted with a manifest blessing and a great bounty
The best of divine gifts [to human beings] is the intellect
From the most perfect of blessings is abundance of intellect
There is no blessing better than intellect
The intellect is the spring of goodness
